Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The Cultists' Advance Party is stationed at the secret entrance to the Dark Cathedral.

Kill the {@LinkCreature:25#1071#Lokian raiders} and {@LinkCreature:25#1072#Lokian brutes}.

Report to Coordinator Delwen when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
